Package emissary.core.sentinel

Class Sentinel

java.lang.Object
emissary.core.sentinel.Sentinel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Sentinel extends Object implements Runnable
Track mobile agents and take action on suspicious behavior
